Text.val: @OCM703 is a submodule of OCM700, permissions, button lables are inherited from OCM700

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DCPP.DCPP_ADMNO, DCPP.DCPP_CLNTNO, DCPP.DCPP_DEBH_NO, DCPP.DCPP_DEBC_DEBC, DEBH.DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DCPP.DCPP_CURRENCY, DCPP.DCPP_ACTINVAC, DCPP.DCPP_DEBC_NO, DCPP.DCPP_ACTINVAFACACCC from :1/DCPP DCPP, :1/DEBH DEBH where DCPP.DCPP_DEBH_NO = DEBH.DEBH_NO :2 order by DCPP.DCPP_ADMNO, DCPP.DCPP_CLNTNO, DCPP.DCPP_DEBH_NO for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
select cast(sum(DCPP.DCPP_ACTINVAC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DCPP.DCPP_ACTINVAFACACCC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DCPP DCPP, :1/DEBH DEBH where DCPP.DCPP_DEBH_NO = DEBH.DEBH_NO :2

select DCPP.DCPP_ADMNO, DCPP.DCPP_CLNTNO, DCPP.DCPP_DEBH_NO, DCPP.DCPP_DEBC_DEBC, DEBH.DEBH_HADR_NAME1, DCPP.DCPP_CURRENCY, DCPP.DCPP_ACTINVAC, DCPP.DCPP_ACTINVAFACACCC from :1/DCPP DCPP, :1/DEBH DEBH where DCPP.DCPP_DEBH_NO = DEBH.DEBH_NO :2 order by DCPP.DCPP_ADMNO, DCPP.DCPP_CLNTNO, DCPP.DCPP_DEBH_NO for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

ExpSyntax.val: Trim (MlsTrans ('Administration number'))&';'&Trim (MlsTrans ('Client number'))&';'&Trim (MlsTrans ('Comfin number'))&';'&Trim (MlsTrans ('Debtor number'))&';'&Trim (MlsTrans ('Debtor name'))&';'&Trim (MlsTrans ('Currency'))
